text: Ammayi Kapuram () is a 1994 Telugu film directed by Muthyala Subbaiah starring Ali, Anand, and Maheswari in the lead roles. This film is based on dowry problems in Telugu community. This film got third best feature film Nandi award. The writer of the film M. V. S. Haranatha Rao received Nandi award as a best story writer. ==Cast== * Ali *Anand * Maheswari *Brahmanandam ==Soundtrack== Soundtrack was composed by Vandemataram Srinivas.https://mio.to/album/Ammayi+Kapuram+%281994%29 *Pelli Eppudu - S. P. Balasubrahmanyam, Manjula *Chamanthi Ro - SPB, K. S.
